revised_title: Anatomy and Function of the Eye and its Surrounding Muscles
topics: Muscules and Nerves of the Orbit
tldr: The author examines the various motions and functions of the eye and its surrounding muscles, including the rapid, insensible motion of the eye-ball and the role of the eye-lids in protecting and clearing the eye. The article also discusses the differences in eye function during waking and sleeping states.
